name: Malcolm In The Middle: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)

reviews.name: Malcolm In The Middle: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: I honestly have to say that when "Malcolm in the Middle" was originally on, I really never watched the show, I watched some of the episodes, but I was in school and didn't have time. Now that I've seen the complete series in re-runs, I must admit I missed out on a fantastic show, I recently purchased "Malcolm in the Middle" the complete first season, and it's great, I would recommend this show for anyone who needs a laugh. Let's face it, every family has it's own "Malcolm".
reviews.title: Best Show

reviews.name: Malcolm In The Middle: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: Would like to buy more shows when they are released.
reviews.title: Want more shows--Malcom in the middle

reviews.name: Malcolm In The Middle: The Complete First Season (Full Frame)
reviews.reviewText: this product is reall cool! the cd case it comes with really stinks! i owned this product for two weeks and it broke!!!! i would sugjest having a case ready and put all the cds in the case before you use the original case! but over all, i would reccomend this series (if you like malcom in the middle!)
reviews.title: 18 January 2008
